metadata.title: CVE-2022-30631 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Reader.Read in compress/gzip before Go 1.17.12and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustionvia an archive containing a large number of concatenated 0-lengthcompressed files.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
